column1: #Text=So far you have filed to run in the New Hampshire primary .
#Text=Do you plan on filing for any other primaries ?
#Text=Yes we are working in other states to be known and have signed up for Louisiana .
#Text=Money is always a problem in a grassroots campaign .
#Text=What do you hope to accomplish with this campaign ?
#Text=That a voice be heard that is different than what is there now .

#Text=The same old , same old get you the same old with no chance of bringing the county back home to where we have full employment , everyone getting along , pulling together regardless of color , race or religion .
#Text=We are Americans all , living on a small rock just hanging out in space .
#Text=What are your thoughts on the job Barack Obama has done as president ?
#Text=Specifically , what would you have done differently ?
#Text=I will not slam an other Democrat who is doing what he feels is correct .
#Text=I would do things differently for sure .
#Text=A. I believe in making friends not enemies .
#Text=B. No sanctions , I consider them an act of war .
#Text=C. Trade with every[one ] on the planet .
#Text=It is good for [ us ] and the products we have to sell â€” jobs .
#Text=D. Healthcare needs to be tweaked ; move it in line with the health plan the congress has and a single payer .
#Text=In your opinion , what are the most important issues facing America and how will you deal with these as president ?
#Text=You see how China is doing it by helping all around the world along with Russia .
#Text=War and the blood of our young and our treasury is causing us to be bled to third world status .
#Text=â€” work with a coalition of nations with the United Nations and root out that nest of vipers once and for all .
#Text=Rebuild those countries devastated by war as was done after World War II .
#Text=Martin Luther King , Jr. delivers his I Have a Dream speech .
#Text=If elected , what would constitute a successful presidency for you ?
#Text=Make friends around the world , fair trade , full employment here at home .
#Text=Where we finally answer Reverend Martin Luther [ King , Jr. ] ' s
#Text=We have a precedent set with the General Motors bailout .
#Text=All the closed factory and manufacturing buildings around the country need to be used .
#Text=Let 's find the people with skills to open them up and get them running .
#Text=The government will have a startup fund to lend , so we can be self sufficient again .
#Text=By closing some of our military bases around the world that money can be used in this country and the military brought home to help secure our borders .
#Text=Remember we are bleeding money and must stop it or we are done .
#Text=One of the best things I feel for all our young is to have a military draft for a two year period of their lives .
#Text=It teaches them order and how to get along and live with people of all colors and religions .
#Text=Add a CCC type of organization to that and give them a choice .
#Text=Then add a GI type of benefits to that .
#Text=As a correction officer I saw the hopelessness of prisoners who could not read or write but were smart .
#Text=If the government uses its money and talent not just on early intervention but in all grades to help these kids who have trouble in school reading and writing etc.
#Text=Americans right now feel a sense of no one cares and we are going nowhere .
#Text=If you are married William then you know money in marriage is the big problem not sex .
#Text=We have people with ideas in this country .
#Text=Let 's use them to make our country self sufficient again .
#Text=Let 's show the country through leadership that we are moving forward together towards a goal .
#Text=No more making scapegoats out of each other .
#Text=Those in office have a hunger for more and more money because they have a need ? ? ? ?
#Text=Well so do those working or having a business .
#Text=We all want to have the good life .
#Text=I see the problems and know there are answers by setting goals , direction and leadership .
#Text=Sorry if I got off on a rant .
